onbon.y2

Class Y2ScreenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.Y2ScreenFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    uia.comm.MessageManager

    public class Y2ScreenFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements uia.comm.MessageManager
    The Y2 screen factory uses UDP to control remote controllers in the same network.
    Author:
    ONBON

      • start

        public void start(int localPort)
        Starts the service.
        Parameters:
        localPort - The port number used to receive responses from remote controllers. CAN NOT be 10001 and 10002.

      • start

        public void start(int localPort,
         int broadcastPort)
        Starts the service.
        Parameters:
        localPort - The port number used to receive responses from remote controllers. CAN NOT be 10001 and 10002.
        broadcastPort - The port number used to broadcast requests to remote controllers.
